author: Lauren Oakey
text:
Can anyone recommend a good web-based shared and public calendar platform other than google calendar?
The aim is for it to enable users to be able to upload their events to the calendar, to be able to link the calendar to a number of websites and potentially for there to be a hyperlink related to each event item.
title: Suggestions for Web-based Shared Public Calendar
